Package gameInitializer

The game initializer collects arguments from the Menu system.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameInit
    The abstract gameInit class Incomplete Contains all fields that are shared between both sub initializers
    MultiPlayerGameInitInfo
    Class used to initialize a multiplayer game
    SinglePlayerGameInitInfo
    Class used to initialize a single player game

Package gameInitializer Description

The game initializer collects arguments from the Menu system. Depending on whether a single player or multiplayer game was created, the Menu System will provide the board size (1 of 2 sizes), the number of CPU players, the number of human players, and player names.
